errorView.unexpectedErrorText: A mysterious curse befall'd th’ ship!

friendsView.confirmDeclineRequestText: Ye sure ye want to toss this request to the briny deep?
friendsView.confirmDeleteRequestText: Be ye certain this request should walk the plank?
friendsView.confirmRemoveFriendText: Ye really want to maroon this mate?
friendsView.noFriendsText: Ye be all alone on this vessel
friendsView.sendSuccessText: Parley sent to the high seas!

global.connectionLostText: Connection to the crow's nest lost – tryin’ again in {{delay}} seconds... (Try {{attempt}} o’ {{maxAttempts}})
global.connectionUnavailableText: No more wind in the sails – retries stopped ‘til refresh!
global.invalidEmailEmptyError: Can’t send nothin’ with an empty bottle!
global.invalidEmailOrUsernameEmptyError: Give us a name or bottle, ya scallywag!
global.invalidEmailOrUsernameFormatError: That ain't a proper sailor name or address!
global.invalidImageFileFormatError: That ain’t a proper lookin’ portrait!
global.invalidNicknameFormatError: Make it 3–20 letters, and use swashbucklin’ marks like [-!?_$.]
global.invalidPasswordEmptyError: Don’t leave yer treasure chest wide open!
global.invalidPasswordFormatError: Yer code needs numbers, big letters, little letters, and pirate symbols [@$!%*?&]!
global.invalidPasswordConfirmationEmptyError: Confirm yer code, or walk the plank!
global.invalidTournamentNameUniquenessError: That name’s already carved into the deck!
global.invalidUsernameFormatError: Name be 3–20 letters and seaworthy marks [-!?_$.]
global.invalidUsernameUniquenessError: That name be claimed by another seadog!
global.somethingWentWrongError: A kraken messed with the code.
global.tournamentIDNotFoundError: No flag found for that tourney!
global.validateTournamentNameError: Tourney name not approved by the Pirate Council.
global.validateUserError:
Problem with yer pirate pass:
Back to port (login)!

homeView.helloUser:
Ahoy {{username}}!
Ye've landed on the home deck

loginView.usernameOrEmailLabel: Pirate name or message bottle address:

newGameView.selectPlayerText: Choose which salty dog {{username}} will command

newTournamentView.confirmAbortTournamentText: Be ye sure ye want to abandon the tourney?
newTournamentView.newTournamentDescriptionText: Name yer tournament and choose how many will duel

profileView.avatarUploadFailedText: Couldn’t hoist yer flag – try again!
profileView.avatarUploadedSuccessText: Yer colors be flyin’ high now!
profileView.cannotChangeEmailOrPWText: Yer bottle code and secret phrase be fixed!
profileView.chooseFileText: Pick an image fer yer pirate flag
profileView.fillAtLeastOneFieldText: Fill at least one chest, matey!
profileView.fillInUsernameText: Enter yer name, ye bilge rat!
profileView.passwordUpdateFailedText: Couldn’t set yer new passphrase. Try again or be cursed!
profileView.passwordUpdatedSuccessText: Secret code changed! Keep it close!
profileView.profileUpdateFailedText: Profile be cursed – try again later!
profileView.updateProfileText: Update yer scroll of records below
profileView.uploadYourAvatarText: Raise yer avatar to the crow’s nest!

registerView.emailOrUsernameExistsText: That name or bottle already has a captain

settingsView.settingsText: Change yer sails and adjust the wind here.

statsView.friendOnlyText: Only mates get to see yer ship logs
